org.czentral.minihttp

Class ChunkedInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.czentral.minihttp.ChunkedInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ChunkedInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    On-the-fly decoding of chunked transfer-encoded data from an InputStream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChunkedInputStream(byte[] data, int offset, int length, java.io.InputStream is)
      Constructs an object with a buffer of previously read data and an InputStream to read the rest of the data from.
